Hérault de Séchelles, Marie-Jean, 1759-1794
Schiefer, John Frederic
France. Convention nationale
metadata.publisher: A Lyon : De l'imprimerie d'Aimé Vatar-Delaroche,
metadata.description: At head of title: Convention nationale
Dated and signed on p.3: John-Fréd. Schiefer, président; Franc. Peacock, secrétaire. Londres, 31 octobre 1792
"Réponse du président de la Convention nationale ...": p.3-4. Signed at end: Le président de la Convention nationale, Hérault
This edition not in Martin & Walter (cf. IV 2: 694) [quarto edition]
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title is on the cover page. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Damaged, stained and/or loose pages.
